metadata.name: PiggyPunks #0001
metadata.description:
This NFT is PiggyPunk's BCA certificate.

What is PiggyPunks?

PiggyPunks is a collection of BabyPig derivative NFTs limited to 6666 Piggy, each NFT represents a Piggy living in the PiggyPunks universe.

AUDIT FINDINGS:

Finding 1-Efficiency - Medium 

Finding 2-Storage utillization - Medium 

Finding 3-Redundant Code - Minor 

Finding 4-Variable Safety - Minor 

Finding 5-Syntax - Minor 

Finding 6-Transaction state unchecked - Minor 

Finding 7-Function Modifier - Minor 

Finding 8-Variable definition - Minor
